{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3555674,"name":null,"username":"Soulemane","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/35a633/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-13T00:20:27.437Z","cooked":"

I have this code GitHub - Soulemane12/Reefscape-2025

in src/main/java/frc/robot/RobotContainer.java

i have this

operator.pov(180).onTrue(
Commands.parallel(
new ElevatorTo0Position(),
new PivotSetPositionCommand(m_Pivot, pivotRequest, -0.10)
)
);

    operator.pov(0).onTrue(
        Commands.sequence(
            new PivotSetPositionCommand(m_Pivot, pivotRequest, PivotConstants.kPivotInPosition),
            Commands.waitSeconds(0.5),
            new ElevatorTo0Position()
        )
    );

    

    operator.a().onTrue(Commands.sequence(
        m_pivotToL2,
        Commands.waitSeconds(0.5),
        m_elevatorToL2Position
    ));
    operator.b().onTrue(Commands.sequence(
        m_pivotToL3.until(() -> Math.abs(m_Pivot.getCurrentPosition() - PivotConstants.kPivotL3Position) < 0.1),
        Commands.waitSeconds(0.5),
        m_elevatorToL3Position
    ));
    operator.y().onTrue(Commands.sequence(
        m_pivotToL4,
        Commands.waitSeconds(0.5),
        m_elevatorToL4Position
    ));

bassically i want to is for the l4 i want the elevtor to go to postion first then move the pivot

i tried this ```
operator.y().onTrue(Commands.sequence(
m_elevatorToL4Position,
Commands.waitSeconds(0.5),
m_pivotToL4
));

and it did not work and im stuck pls help me

Soulemane:

it did not work

Could you describe what’s the robot behaviour vs. the one you are expecting?

Is the sequence to move to L3 you mapped to b() working?

it works when i have pivot go first then elevator for all button but for l4 i want elevator to go first then pivot but when i run it only elevtor goes but pivot dosent move

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2025-03-13T01:34:46.820Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":52,"readers_count":51,"score":25.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":495374,"topic_slug":"i-need-help-with-my-command-sequence-for-elevator-and-pivot","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":45989,"username":"GodCed","name":"Cédric","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/858c86/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":71252,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/i-need-help-with-my-command-sequence-for-elevator-and-pivot/495374/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3555792,"name":"Fletch","username":"Fletch1373","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fletch1373/{size}/220073_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-13T02:49:51.231Z","cooked":"

Given that description, I’d assume your ElevatorToL4 or whatever command isn’t finishing cleanly. You can log your subsystem to SmartDashboard to see what the active command requiring it is (to prove it never exits), but given the body of your isFinished method, I’d probably just log the position in that method to confirm that it never actually reaches it. Assuming that is the case, that explains the problem youve described above. The next step would be to figure out why it doesnt make it (presumably incorrectly tuned PID or something)
